name: Mon Samsara
description:
Mon Samsara A transformative game exploring our life habits.

By playing Mon Samsara, you get to gently orient the development of a human being and choose how to fill his or her life with objects and people to make it all worthwhile.

These bonds impact when and how it all ends. But what is the meaning of it all?  Only you can know the answer.

How to play

When an item is within your reach, just click and hold to capture it.
For the rest, the fun is in figuring it out for yourself!

Controls

Mouse pointer = Highlight object
Left mouse button (Click and hold) = Charge and drag object

Get in touch

We would love to hear your thoughts on this game!

You can share your thoughts from within the game once you have completed at least one playthrough or leave a comment in the comment section below.
